title: Amanda Solloway – 2020 Comments on Military Communications System
author: admin
summary: The text of the comments made by Amanda Solloway, the Science Minister, on 19 July 2020.
content:
Space technology plays an important role in supporting our military and keeping us safe, while also boosting the UK’s economy and enabling world-leading science and research.
